# Implement Panel Styles for Neo Cyberpunk

Implement the SCSS overrides for `Neo.container.Panel` in the `neo-theme-cyberpunk`.

**Tasks:**
1.  Create `resources/scss/theme-cyberpunk/container/Panel.scss`.
2.  Override panel-specific CSS variables to match the Cyberpunk aesthetic.
    - Border colors (neon glow?)
    - Header backgrounds
    - Header text typography (uppercase, monospace)
